comment.body:
> [vaerospace](#comment_2_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): really battling to get port opened anyone got any advice...?

this got unsolved for me, i think it have to do with a firewall, router (it support forwarding posts) and possibly VPN is you are using it to stay anonymous. I may be wrong.
